## Pull SFO Synthetic Data

```{r}
# load library to convert json to r object
library(jsonlite)

script_folder <- "./10x/"
data_folder <- paste0(script_folder, "data/")

# set the url for the json data
base_url <- "https://oedi-data-lake.s3.amazonaws.com/SMART-DS/"
version <- "v1.0"
year <- "2018"
city <- "SFO"
region <- "P13U"
data_type <- "scenarios"
scenario <- "base_timeseries"
data_format <- "geojson"
subset <- "p13uhs0_1247--p13udt13213.json"
url <- paste0(base_url, version, "/", year, "/", city, "/", region, "/", data_type, "/", scenario, "/", data_format, "/", subset)

# convert the content to a json object
json <- fromJSON(url)

# convert to chr
test <- toJSON(json)

# export to a file
write(test, paste0(data_folder, region, "_", scenario, "_", subset, ".json"))
```
